title.narrative: Social Protection Rights Component of Hunger Safety Net Phase 2

description.narrative: To contribute to the reduction of poverty in the four poorest counties in the Arid and Semi-Arid Lands region of Kenya through increasing accountability from all stakeholders (but especially the Kenyan government) in the delivery of HSNP - the unconditional cash transfer social welfare progamme.

participating-org.narrative: Kenya National Commission on Human Rights (KNCHR)
PISP - Pastoralist Integrated Support Programme, K
RACIDA - Rural Agency for Community Development an
Women for Peace and Development (WFPD), Kenya

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA
